subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Watsdachances survived a four-horse battle in the final sixteenth of a mile and won by a neck in the $100,000 P. G. Johnson Stakes for 2-year-old fillies at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: Watsdachances survived a four-horse battle in the final sixteenth of a mile and won by a neck in the $100,000 P. G. Johnson Stakes for 2-year-old fillies at Saratoga Race Course.
